items.raw_desc: Mikrofon Luucco Melo-S1 Large Diaphragm Studio Condenser Microphone:The Luucco Melo-S1 large-diaphragm condenser microphone is a studio microphone designed for exceptional sound recording quality. It is ideal for recording vocals, acoustic instruments and other sound sources where detailed and faithful reproduction is key. The Melo-S1 microphone uses a large 34mm gold-plated diaphragm and a cardioid polar pattern that minimizes sound pickup from the sides and rear and focuses on the sound source directly in front of the microphone. It delivers clear and detailed sound with a frequency response of 20-20,000 Hz. The microphone connects via a balanced 3-pin XLR connector and requires 24V or 48V phantom power. The package also includes a shock mount and a 3/8" to 5/8" adapter to facilitate mounting on various microphone stands. Ezt ki lehet használni a dokumentumok nyomtatás előtti ellenőrzésekor vagy akár prezentációk esetében. A tükröződés minimálisra csökken a tükröződésmentes kijelzőfelületnek köszönhetően, amely különböző fényviszonyok mellett is javítja a láthatóságot.
